api.title: Sorry, something went wrong
api.detail: We can't continue right now. Please try again later.

child.title: We don't support building savings for children yet in the app
child.detail: Please visit any branch. Don't forget to bring the child's birth certificate and your ID.

scoring.title: Sorry, something went wrong
scoring.detail: Unfortunately, we can't continue in the app, but we're happy to help you at a branch – please remember to bring your ID.

cantProceed.title: Building savings for you is not yet supported in the app.
cantProceed.detail: Please visit any branch. Don't forget to ideally bring two IDs.

disagreement.title: Unfortunately, it can't be done without your consent
disagreement.detail:
You're just one step away from building savings.
Do you have any questions? Call us or visit the nearest branch.

CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night...
CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: We perform system maintenance every night, so some may not be available. Unfortunately, we can't prepare your documents right now – we'll have them ready for you in the morning around eight. Thank you for your patience.

helpOffer.title: The best building savings can be found in the app
helpOffer.detail:
You can find all information about building savings on our website.

Do you have any questions? Call us or visit your nearest branch.
bullets: Interest and state contribution – grow your deposits with a special interest rate of 4.9% guaranteed until the end of 2025
Safely stored money – your deposits are safe and insured up to 100,000 EUR.
Money for anything – after 6 years of saving you can use your saved funds for anything.

helpPersonalDetail.title: Checking Your Information
helpPersonalDetail.detail: We need to check together if there has been any change in your information. If so, you'll confirm it by providing your national ID in the next step. Simply take a picture of it directly in our app and we'll be able to continue right away. Photo capture is, of course, secure with us. Any questions? Let's go through it together.

helpUploadDocument.title: Unfortunately, you can't continue without a current ID
helpUploadDocument.detail: There has been a change in your personal information, which must be confirmed with a photo of your current documents. Photo capture is secure with us and takes just a minute. Any questions? Let's go through it together.

buildingSavingsCalculator.title: Building Savings
buildingSavingsCalculator.subtitle: Set up your building savings
bullets: Receive double the state contribution and a bonus of up to CZK 6,000. Learn more about this promotion on our website.
Get a bonus of CZK 500 for arranging in Smart Banka. Learn more about this promotion on our website.
Get a large-deposit bonus of CZK 3,000 . Learn more about this promotion on our website.

amountTip.title: What is a monthly deposit?
amountTip.detail: A monthly deposit is the amount you want to regularly put into your building savings account. You can increase your deposits over time or even make deposits just once per year.

buildingSavingsCalculator.totalTip: With a monthly deposit of at least 1,700 CZK you get the maximum state support of 1,000 CZK per year.
buildingSavingsCalculator.secondaryButton: I want to save for a child

information.text: By continuing you consent to MONETA Money Bank, a.s. sharing your personal data with MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s. for the purpose of your identification. More information here.

infoScreen.title: Identification Transfer
infoScreen.detail:
By continuing, you consent to the transfer of your personal data by MONETA Money Bank, a.s. to MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s. for your identification as required by Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on certain measures against money laundering and terrorist financing in the following scope:

First and last name, personal identification number; place of birth; gender; address of permanent residence – or other residence address; citizenship; type, number, and date of validity of the identity document, the country which issued the document, and upon request of MONETA Stavební Spořitelna, a.s., a copy of the identity document.

amlQuestionnaire.title: Legally required information
amlQuestionnaire.detail: We are required by law to ask for this information (Act No. 253/2008 Coll. on anti-money laundering).

wrongTaxResidenceDialog.title: We will open a building savings for you if you pay taxes only in the Czech Republic
wrongTaxResidenceDialog.detail: Do you really pay taxes outside the Czech Republic? In that case, please visit a branch where we will complete the process.
wrongTaxResidenceDialog.primaryButton: I pay taxes only in the Czech Republic
wrongTaxResidenceDialog.secondaryButton: I pay taxes outside the Czech Republic

depositOrigin.text: What is the main source of funds you will send or deposit to the building savings account?

options.description: Sickness and pension insurance benefits, social care benefits, state social support benefits, orphan's pension, etc.

options.text: Income from family members / Winnings / Gifts
Bank transfers from my own account
A third person will deposit cash
Non-cash transfers will be sent by a third person

rangeOfIncome.text: What is your approximate regular monthly income?

taxResidence.text: Do you pay taxes only in the Czech Republic?

simpleDocumentUpload.title: Oops, we need your current ID card
simpleDocumentUpload.detail: It looks like the ID card you provided earlier is no longer valid. Please upload a new one.

141.title: ID Card
141.detail: Some data has changed since your last visit

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the front side of the ID card
photoCapture.detail: Valid document, in good lighting, sharp and clear.

photoCapture.title: Take a photo of the back side of the ID card
photoCapture.detail: Valid document, in good lighting, sharp and clear.

busyLoader.title: Please wait a moment, our cat needs to check everything
busyLoader.detail: This will take just a few seconds.

uploadDocumentResultNok.title: We can't open a foreign currency account for you now

uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.title: Oops, this didn't work out
uploadDocumentResultUploadAgain.detail: Please take the document photo again, in good lighting, sharp and clear.

review.title: Great photo! Did we read everything correctly?

personalData.title: We will verify the data you provided also in central registers. Read more about the registers on the website of the Administration of Basic Registers and Moneta. By clicking Continue, you confirm that all information provided is true, accurate and up to date.

precontractInfo.title: Please read the pre-contract information
precontractInfo.subtitle: All documents are available in Smart Bank and Internet Bank under Documents and in your email

contract.title: Please read the contract with product terms
contract.subtitle: All documents are available in Smart Bank and Internet Bank under Documents and in your email
contract.checkbox: I declare I have read these documents, including documents received by email in the previous step - List of Fees for Provided Services, General Business Terms for Building Savings, Information Overview of the Deposit Insurance System for Client Deposits and Payment Instructions.

scoring.title:
Please wait a moment,
we have to check everything
scoring.subtitle: We will continue soon.

waitingBeforeContract.title: One moment, we're preparing your documents for signing

signByUs.title: Now we need to sign it, please wait a moment

buildingSavingsVictory.title: Done! You can start saving
buildingSavingsVictory.detail: You can now set up a standing order to make sure you don't miss out on the state support. You'll find the building savings documentation in Smart Bank and a confirmation of activation will be sent to you in the coming days.
buildingSavingsVictory.checkbox: Start saving now - we will send the first payment of {0} from the selected account and set up a monthly standing order.
